name: 108 Monsters
description:
★A unique sprinting action RPG presented by the developer of “Larva Link”★

▶ Excitingly speedy action RPG
- Experience the speed that reminds of run-game!
- The crazy sense of striking by cute characters is only an extra.

▶ Tapping has never been this entertaining!
- Tap! More effective attacks!
- Tap! More gold and items!
- Tap! Defend yourself from the bosses!

▶ Fiery PvP Mode
- Filled with explosion of speedy action, it’s the best Arena ever created.
- Take advantage of upgrade system, such as random rune combination, to take 1st place in the Arena.

▶ Extensive Scenario Mode
- Total of 108 bosses, 15 chapters, and over 300 stages (update scheduled).
- Meet hundreds of unique and adorable monsters!
